title: THURSDAY 2/4 - Latest news from Super Bowl LV
itunes:title: THURSDAY 2/4 - Latest news from Super Bowl LV
description:
We're just 3 days away from Super Bowl LV in Tampa...we'll have the latest injury update on Bucs wide receiver Antonio Brown (0:12) and we'll hear what Tom Brady has to say about his wide receiver (0:38). Linebacker Lavonte David tells us about Brady's reaction in the locker room after clinching the NFC Conference Championship (1:14). Patrick Mahomes goes for his second straight Super Bowl title and Bucs defensive coordinator Todd Bowles knows Mahomes is quite the handful for defenses (2:48). As for Mahomes, he's not satisfied with just reaching the big game (3:44)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
